text:
Upon Apache upgrade from 2.2.22 to 2.4.7 with the OS upgrade of Ubuntu 12.04 to 14.04, modules are not compiling.

Specifically the val_cert_module, which I cannot find any documentation on, and a Mutex argument. 

Val_cert_module is reporting an error that the apache is expecting a different signature, specifically the one for 2.4. It is reporting the one for 2.2.22.

Mutex is returning invalid directories.
creator: devin.snook.ctr@navy.mil

text:
You need to obtain a copy of that module compiled against 2.4. It didn't come from the ASF.

For Mutex, check and fix the argument.
creator: covener@gmail.com
